Constructor Detail

Laboratory

public Laboratory(org.oreilly.is.Agent monkey)
Creates a new environment, which is passed a reference to the agent.

Parameters:
monkey - the agent

Laboratory

public Laboratory(org.oreilly.is.Agent monkey,
                  EnvType envType)
Creates a new environment, which is passed a reference to the agent and the environment type.

Parameters:
monkey - the agent.
envType - the environment type. It can be:
  • EnvType.STATIC
  • EnvType.DYNAMIC
  • EnvType.USER_DEFINED
    Method Detail

    setIntervalTime

    public void setIntervalTime(int time)
    Set the time interval during which the bunch of bananas will remain motionless. After this time, it will set a new location.

    Parameters:
    time - the interval time.

    getIntervalTime

    public int getIntervalTime()
    Get the time interval during which the bunch of bananas will remain motionless. After this time, it will set a new location.

    Returns:
    the interval time

    Returns:
    true if the environment type is user defined
